welcome: Hi, {name}! I'm Noteme, a bot for tracking important dates and notes.

onboarding.intro: I remember important dates and find beautiful numbers in them. How it works: 1. Tell me about an event — voice or text: "Wedding with Maria on July 17, 2022" I'll understand the date, create the event, and add tags. 2. Add notes: "Maria wants a hot air balloon ride" I'll link the note to the right event. 3. Get notifications about beautiful dates: "In 10 days — exactly 777 days since the wedding 📝 Maria wants a hot air balloon ride" Notifications are sent as spoilers — no one will see and ruin the surprise. Works for everyone: friends, parents, colleagues. Photos, videos, files — I'll save them as notes too.
onboarding.step1:
Tell me about an important event — text or voice.

Examples:
💍 "Wedding with Maria on July 17, 2022"
🎂 "Mike's birthday March 3, 1995"
onboarding.step2:
Now add a note — a gift idea or something to remember.

Examples:
💍 "Maria wants a hot air balloon ride"
🎂 "Mike dreams of Sony headphones"
onboarding.step3: All set! Use the menu below to navigate.
